llm.feedback: Actionable edits to elevate to world-class: tighten the causal chain by explicitly linking AI/cloud productivity to margin expansion, free cash flow, dividends, and then to multiple re-rating, grounding each link in the anchors (21.2% cloud CAGR; Azure 39% growth; UNH FCF >9%; Lulu cash ~$1.3B with no debt) and citing the IDs (0G3A676BP)(IGP1Q4ZEJ); restructure the four lines to a crisp Up/Down | Time window | Driver/Mechanism | What to watch | Probability% format with 2 Ups and 2 Downs, and add explicit invalidation rules per line (e.g., Base-case invalidation if DOJ risk for UNH intensifies or real rates rise meaningfully); replace generic watch items with data-driven triggers such as Azure growth persistence, UNH/LULU FCF trajectories, and 10-year yield around 4.2% or energy/tariff dynamics (GX057ADL7)(J99EM2TPZ)(RHXDOHQQX); tighten probability numbers to anchored bands (e.g., Up 3–6m 60–70% if Azure growth stays ~39% and cloud CAGR ~21%; Down 3–6m 25–35% if UNH guidance or DOJ risk materializes or cloud capex slows), with all facts tied to source IDs; ensure no non-source assertions and maintain the 4-line format throughout with consistent citation discipline (0G3A676BP)(IGP1Q4ZEJ)(GX057ADL7)(J99EM2TPZ)(RHXDOHQQX)(SK994CBWR)(48JXC9VDP).
